main event: Various correspondence and reports about unidentified flying objects from the Project Blue Book and on eyewitness accounts.
interesting points: Dr. E. H. T. Whitten identified a supposed UFO specimen as a metamorphic rock, suggesting better accuracy in reporting sightings., A letter from the Air Force requested more detailed information on UFO sightings., An eyewitness described seeing a circular object hovering 25 to 30 feet above the ground without windows or doors., The object was reported as silvery white and had a diameter of about 40 feet., A questionnaire was included for witnesses to provide detailed information about their sightings.
sighted object: a circular silvery white object hovering near the ground
witness description: The eyewitness described the object in detail as large and hovering for several minutes before ascending quickly.
